name: Lufthansa - Ultimate First Class Flight Review
description:
Try Dashlane here:  https://www.dashlane.com/dennis
Get 10% off now with my promo code:  dennis

Let’s experience the ultimate in German travel luxury as we fly Lufthansa First Class from Munich to New York City.   This Lufthansa First Class Flight Review was filmed on the iconic Airbus A340-600 aircraft and covers the full Lufthansa First Class experience from the first class lounge in Munich through to arrival at JFK.  On the way we enjoy the wonderful inflight service from the Lufthansa crew, taste delicious food, decadent drinks and relax in the comfort of the unique Lufthansa first class seat – while of course wearing our Lufthansa inflight pjs!  

Route:     Munich, Germany (MUC) to New York City, USA (JFK)
Length:   4,032 miles,  8:40 hrs
Flight:     LH410
When:    Nov 2018
Aircraft:  Airbus A340-600  registration D-AIHT (July 2003)
Seat:       2K
Camera:  Panasonic HC-VX1


This video may not be reproduced without specific permission.
